main event: A witness reported seeing a single unidentified object in the sky on 15 July 1965 in Miamisburg, Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as being of unusual orange color, hovering at a very low altitude,Estimated at a 25-degree elevation & a distance of 1/4 mile.,It was in view for approximately 10 to 15 minutes.,Witnesses heard a sound behind the object.,The object appeared as a bright white light and reportedly moved at a relatively low speed.
